pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.descriptionM: For some time after its birth, it uses the nutrients that are packed into the seed on its back in order to grow.
pokemon.descriptionF: It carries a seed on its back right from birth. As its body grows larger, the seed does too.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.descriptionM: The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life-force. If Charmander is weak, the flame also burns weakly.
pokemon.descriptionF: If Charmander is healthy, the flame on the tip of its tail will burn vigorously and won’t go out even if it gets a bit wet.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.descriptionM: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It sprays a potent foam from its mouth.
pokemon.descriptionF: Its shell is soft immediately after it is born. In no time at all, the shell becomes so resilient that a prodding finger will bounce right off it.

pokemon.name: Chikorita
pokemon.descriptionM: It loves to bask in the sunlight. It uses the leaf on its head to seek out warm places.
pokemon.descriptionF: Its pleasantly aromatic leaf has the ability to check the humidity and temperature of the area around it.

pokemon.name: Cyndaquil
pokemon.descriptionM: It usually stays hunched over. If it is angry or surprised, it shoots flames out of its back.
pokemon.descriptionF: The fire that spouts from its back burns hottest when it is angry. The flaring flames intimidate foes.

pokemon.name: Totodile
pokemon.descriptionM: Its powerful, well-developed jaws are capable of crushing anything. Even its Trainer must be careful.
pokemon.descriptionF: This rough critter chomps at any moving object it sees. Turning your back on it is not recommended.

pokemon.name: Treeko
pokemon.descriptionM: The small hooks on the soles of its feet latch on to walls and ceilings, so it will never fall even while hanging upside down.
pokemon.descriptionF: Treecko can quickly scale even vertical surfaces. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.

pokemon.name: Torchic
pokemon.descriptionM: Torchic feels toasty warm if you hug it. It has a flame sac inside its belly, and the flames burn continuously as long as Torchic has life in it.
pokemon.descriptionF: In its belly, it has a sac filled with burning fire, meaning that Torchic feels as warm as a hot-water bottle if you hug it.

pokemon.name: Mudkip
pokemon.descriptionM: It has the power to crush large boulders into pieces. To rest, it buries itself in mud at the bottom of a river.
pokemon.descriptionF: When it uses its large tail fin, it picks up speed rapidly in the water. It is strong in spite of its small size.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.descriptionM: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.
pokemon.descriptionF: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity can build and cause lightning storms.
